rev.desc.rev.desc: Task category's "Assigned number before Commit" should only works for forground taks creation.

QCCR1E71209 -Condition task. allow user define condition for task in change model.task will be activated when its condition evaluated to true or deactivated when condition evaluated to false, otherwise wating. add a new panel 'refresh.waiting.tasks.status' to check task condition when change is updated.

QCCR1E69247 - Tasks that are opened due to a phase change of the parent AND have a dependent task from a previous phase that has been closed were not getting the correct status (they were set to waiting instead of active).

Change:Changed the following expression from:if null(denull(3 in $L.i in tasks in $L.plan)) then (status in $L.task="1") else (status in $L.task="0")To:if null(denull(3 in $L.i in tasks in $L.plan)) then (status in $L.task="1") else (status in $L.task=jscall("changePlan.setInitStatus", $L.i - 1, $L.plan))

descript.descript: Task category's "Assigned number before Commit" should only works for forground taks creation.

QCCR1E71209 -Condition task. allow user define condition for task in change model.task will be activated when its condition evaluated to true or deactivated when condition evaluated to false, otherwise wating. add a new panel 'refresh.waiting.tasks.status' to check task condition when change is updated.

QCCR1E69247 - Tasks that are opened due to a phase change of the parent AND have a dependent task from a previous phase that has been closed were not getting the correct status (they were set to waiting instead of active).

Change:Changed the following expression from:if null(denull(3 in $L.i in tasks in $L.plan)) then (status in $L.task="1") else (status in $L.task="0")To:if null(denull(3 in $L.i in tasks in $L.plan)) then (status in $L.task="1") else (status in $L.task=jscall("changePlan.setInitStatus", $L.i - 1, $L.plan))
